verbs.description: [ARG0: iran] [V: sells] [ARG1: oil] [ARGM-LOC: on exchange] [ARGM-PRP: in bid to counter sanctions] iran sold oil to private buyers through its energy exchange for the first time on sunday as part of its efforts to counter the imminent return of us sanctions iran gulf exchange eshaq jahangiri us donald trump khark island kharg island shapour mohammadi vice - president
